# Strategy: **(2015-06-11)Fund Strategy 3 117% AR ***HWRT 2.1 + Scale-in Frontrunner (UVXY)  (Invest Copy)
Source: https://app.composer.trade/symphony/TmZj9jaaqsWwnsrFcFr5/details

**Complexity**: High (9/10)
**Description**: High Win Rate Test 2.1 + Focused on high quality conditions when going 100% in a position. Did poor before volatility index took off in 2018. Almost all scale-In tickers swapped for UVXY.
**Category**: Tactical

## Trading Universe
This strategy can trade 22 assets:

• **Stocks**: IOO, UVXY, TQQQ, RETL, BTAL, SHV, XLF, SPY, SOXL, TECL, LABU, QQQ, SMH, TECS, SOXS, TMV, TMF, XLP, VTV, VOX, CURE, BIL

## Strategy Settings
• **Rebalancing**: Daily
• **Initial Capital**: USD 100,000
• **Trading Fees**: 0.10% per trade

## Investment Logic

```
• Equal Weight Allocation:
  ◦ If :
    ▪ If IOO's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 80.0:
      - Buy UVXY (100% of portfolio)
    ▪ Else branch:
      - Equal Weight Allocation:
        - If :
          - If TQQQ's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 81.0:
            - Equal Weight Allocation:
              - If :
                - If UVXY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 40.0:
                  - Buy UVXY (100% of portfolio)
                - Else branch:
                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                    - If :
                      - If RETL's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 82.0:
                        - Scale-In | BTAL -> VIX:
                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                            - If :
                              - If RETL's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 85.0:
                                - VIX Blend:
                                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                    - Buy UVXY (100% of portfolio)
                              - Else branch:
                                - BTAL/BIL:
                                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                    - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                                    - Buy SHV (100% of portfolio)
                      - Else branch:
                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                          - If :
                            - If XLF's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 81.0:
                              - Scale-In | VIX -> VIX+:
                                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                  - If :
                                    - If XLF's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 85.0:
                                      - VIX Blend+:
                                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                          - Buy UVXY (20% of portfolio)
                                    - Else branch:
                                      - VIX Blend:
                                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                          - Buy UVXY (100% of portfolio)
                            - Else branch:
                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                - Buy SHV (100% of portfolio)
          - Else branch:
            - Equal Weight Allocation:
              - If :
                - If SPY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 80.0:
                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                    - If :
                      - If UVXY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 40.0:
                        - Buy UVXY (100% of portfolio)
                      - Else branch:
                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                          - If :
                            - If RETL's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 82.0:
                              - Scale-In | BTAL -> VIX:
                                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                  - If :
                                    - If RETL's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 85.0:
                                      - VIX Blend:
                                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                          - Buy UVXY (100% of portfolio)
                                    - Else branch:
                                      - BTAL/BIL:
                                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                          - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                                          - Buy SHV (100% of portfolio)
                            - Else branch:
                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                - If :
                                  - If XLF's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 81.0:
                                    - Scale-In | VIX -> VIX+:
                                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                        - If :
                                          - If XLF's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 85.0:
                                            - VIX Blend+:
                                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                - Buy UVXY (100% of portfolio)
                                          - Else branch:
                                            - VIX Blend:
                                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                - Buy UVXY (20% of portfolio)
                                  - Else branch:
                                    - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                      - Buy SHV (100% of portfolio)
                - Else branch:
                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                    - If :
                      - If SOXL's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is less than 30.0:
                        - Buy SOXL (100% of portfolio)
                      - Else branch:
                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                          - If :
                            - If TECL's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is less than 30.0:
                              - Buy TECL (100% of portfolio)
                            - Else branch:
                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                - If :
                                  - If LABU's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is less than 22.0:
                                    - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                      - Select the bottom 1 asset by cumulative-return (10-day) from: LABU, SOXL
                                  - Else branch:
                                    - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                      - If :
                                        - If QQQ's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is less than 30.0:

                                        - Else branch:

                                                                                  - If :

                                                                                          - Buy UVXY (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                    - Else branch:
```
